about_the_game:
Expedition Zero is a survival horror game set in the heart of rural Siberia. As a lone survivor of a Soviet scientific expedition, you will need all of your cutting-edge tech and engineering skills to survive.

The unexpected meteorite crash turned the endless Siberian taiga into a nightmare exclusion zone. The military bases went into radio silence, and the locals spread rumors about the obscure flesh-eating creatures lurking in the woods. Expedition Zero, the most advanced Soviet scientific expedition was immediately sent to the zone.

Many years later, the lone survivor is still trying to find his way home. And deadly frost is not the worst enemy that awaits him.

Expedition Zero, the most advanced Soviet scientific expedition was immediately sent to the zone.

name: Expedition Zero Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 MB available space

short_description: Expedition Zero is a survival horror game set in the heart of rural Siberia. A meteorite crash turned the taiga forest into an endless zone of cold and terror. As a lone survivor of a Soviet scientific expedition, you will need all of your cutting-edge tech and engineering skills to survive.
